(Oh, great! Yanshosh can't see the line where Zardus ends and he 
begins. Now he'll unleash a reign of terror none of us have ever 
seen! AHHHHHH!)


Brix/Fliq


"How many planets?" said Brix, "Well, there's Cybertron of course, 
and Gaea, and Savren 6 and...about 20 to 30. None lool like Earth 
though. What a shame that in a few million years humans will evolve 
and ruin it. Oh look, we're here. Come on guys, load the stuff."

Brix and Fliq begin putting the hull in the shuttle.
______________________________________________________________________
Savage

Savage starts spinning around, getting dizzy, while shots are hitting 
his eye. Striker keeps movin around too fast. Finaly he meets eye to 
eye with Striker. He opens his huge, massive mouth and lunges towards 
him.
